name: Got It Bad
content: Write me in your story she said
To me at the party I said
Pull me in your orbit she said
What can you do for me
I wanna move with you all night long
You wanna dance till we see the sun
Got it got it got it bad
I'm the best she ever had
We got no reason to wait
We both got love on the brain yeah
I know you feeling the same yeah
When you moving just like that
I got it got it got it bad
But I know you gonna hold me down
I don't know what we doing ooh
But I know that we cooling ooh
And I love it when you lose it ooh
What you do with that body
We hit the curves in the rari
You know that you got me
Got it got it got it bad
I'm the best she ever had
We got no reason to wait
We both got love on the brain yeah
I know you feeling the same yeah
When you moving just like that
I got it got it got it bad
